# C# Language Reference

> Comprehensive reference for C# language syntax including keywords, operators, statements, types, and attributes. Documents reserved keywords like `class`, `async`, `await` and contextual keywords like `var`, `dynamic`, `record`. Use for precise syntax and semantic details.

- [Configure language version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/configure-language-version.md): Learn how to override the default C# language version manually. The C# compiler can support any language version up to the version in the installed SDK.
- [Language versioning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/language-versioning.md): Learn about how the C# language version is determined based on your project and the reasons behind that choice.
- [Preprocessor directives](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/preprocessor-directives.md): Learn the different C# preprocessor directives that control conditional compilation, warnings, nullable analysis, and more
- [Unsafe code, pointers to data, and function pointers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/unsafe-code.md): Learn about unsafe code, pointers, and function pointers. C# requires you to declare an unsafe context to use these features to directly manipulate memory or function pointers (unmanaged delegates).

## Subtopics

- [Attributes Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/attributes/llms.txt): 5 topics; Attributes Docs documentation and reference.
- [Builtin Types Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/llms.txt): 20 topics; Builtin Types Docs documentation and reference.
- [Compiler messages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-messages/llms.txt): 179 topics; Compiler messages documentation and reference.
- [Compiler Options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/llms.txt): 10 topics; Compiler Options documentation and reference.
- [C# Keywords and contextual keywords](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/llms.txt): 72 topics; C# Keywords and contextual keywords documentation and reference.
- [Operators and expressions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/operators/llms.txt): 34 topics; Operators and expressions documentation and reference.
- [Statements Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/statements/llms.txt): 10 topics; Statements Docs documentation and reference.
- [Special Characters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/tokens/llms.txt): 6 topics; Special Characters documentation and reference.
- [XML API documentation comments comments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/language-reference/xmldoc/llms.txt): 3 topics; XML API documentation comments comments documentation and reference.
